name: Free For All
flavor_text:
Default formation where members fight freely.
Grants no bonuses, but works for any party without a specific strategy.

name: Amazon Raid
flavor_text:
Attack formation that boosts the front line's STR.
For parties who mainly use Swords, G. Swords, Axes, Clubs, M. Arts and Spears.

name: Speculation
flavor_text:
Quick-strike formation that boosts the front line's STR and AGI.
For parties who mainly use M. Arts.

name: Hunter's Gambit
flavor_text:
Quick-strike formation that boosts the AGI of the front four.
Enhances the back line's DEX. For parties who mainly use S. Swords, Bows, and Guns.

name: Imperial Cross
flavor_text:
Defensive formation that boosts the front line's END. The front line also draws enemy attacks, improving party survival.
For parties based on a member with high END.

name: Rising Phoenix
flavor_text:
Defensive formation that boosts the center's END, INT and the entire party's WIL. The center draws enemy attacks, improving party survival.
For fighting against powerful spells.

name: Desert Lance
flavor_text: Defensive formation that enhances the front line, who draws enemy attacks, improving party survival. The back line's AGI is lowered, but the front line's offensive and defensive attributes are enhanced. Good for counterattacks while mitigating damage.

name: Seer's Focus
flavor_text:
Attack formation that boosts the back member's INT. Boosts the front line's AGI.
For parties who mainly use spells. Enhanced WIL allows the party to stand up to the enemy's spells and status ailments.

name: Rapid Stream
flavor_text:
Quick-strike formation that boosts the party's AGI but lowers its END.
For parties which want to strike first, regardless of weapon type.

name: Dragon Stance
flavor_text:
Special formation that focuses on enhancing its lead member. Boosts the middle and front lines' AGI.
For building strategies based on a specific member.

name: Magical Shower
flavor_text:
Attack formation for mages which boosts the two back line members' INT. The three members in front draw enemy attacks, reducing chance of back line getting attacked.
The back's INT boost is perfect for parties who mainly use spells.

name: Divine Wall
flavor_text: Balanced formation for both offense and defense. The front line draws enemy attacks while the back line inflicts damage. Enhances the back line's DEX. For parties who mainly use S. Swords, Bows, and Guns.

name: Sigmoid Form
flavor_text: Special formation that boosts both STR/INT. Boosts front's AGI while lowering back's AGI. Good for controlling action order.

name: Free For All
flavor_text:
Three-member formation.
Spread out in a vertical line that evenly disperses enemy attacks. Grants no bonuses.

name: Open Delta
flavor_text: Three-member, fan-shaped formation in which the two front line members draw enemy attacks. Grants no bonuses.

name: Closed Delta
flavor_text: Three-member, fan-shaped formation in which the single front line member draws enemy attacks. Grants no bonuses.

name: Single File
flavor_text: Three-member, single file assault formation in which the front member is more likely to be targeted. Grants no bonuses.

name: Deadly Pierce
flavor_text:
Attack formation that sacrifices speed and durability to focus on offense.
The front and middle lines' DEX are enhanced.

name: Anima Stream
flavor_text: Attack mage formation that boosts front four's INT. Weakens defense and recovery, yet greatly enhances spell attacks. Advantage lies in mages being able to strike first.

name: Dragoon Strike
flavor_text: Attack formation which enhances the middle line's STR and can help defend Attacker-type members by making them less likely to be targeted by enemies. For parties who mainly use Swords, G. Swords, Axes, Clubs, M. Arts and Spears.

name: Tiger's Den
flavor_text: Defensive formation that grants all members <special_effect=800000077>Pre-Action Defense Boost</special_effect>. Great against enemies' all-range attacks, but must sacrifice action priority for defense boost.

name: Tiger Shark
flavor_text: Special formation that controls damage taken and boosts attack damage. Front draws enemy attacks, while front and back line's attack attributes are enhanced.

name: Rainbow Rangers
flavor_text: Special formation that optimizes use of each member's attributes. Positions determine what's boosted. For mixed parties using a variety of weapon types or attack elements.

name: Inverse Sigmoid
flavor_text: Special formation that boosts DEX and INT. Front line gets AGI boost while back line has AGI lowered. Good for controlling action order.

name: Free For All 1
flavor_text: Advanced FFA. Quick-strike formation. Boosts AGI for front who draws attacks, and INT/LOV for back who's less likely to be targeted. Good for assigning attack and support roles.

name: Deadly Pierce EX
flavor_text: Improved Deadly Pierce formation that boosts attack and defense. The front member gains <special_effect=800000077>Pre-Action Defense Boost</special_effect>, and the action order of the outer wings is increased.

name: Scattered
flavor_text: Attack formation that boosts M. Arts skill damage for the front and middle. Front line gets AGI boost while the action order for middle and back is lowered. Good for controlling action order.

name: Multi-Counter
flavor_text: Counter formation that raises counterattack damage for front two who draw enemy attacks. Boosts middle line's INT/LOV. Good for assigning roles.

name: Amazon Raid EX
flavor_text: Improved Amazon Raid formation that boosts attack further. For parties who mainly use Swords, G. Swords, Axes, Clubs, M. Arts and Spears.

name: Bullet Shift
flavor_text: Quick-strike formation that boosts the front and middle lines' AGI. Enhances the entire party's DEX. For parties who mainly use S. Swords, Bows, and Guns.

name: Desert Lance EX
flavor_text: Improved Desert Lance formation that boosts defense further. The front draws enemy attacks, improving party survival. Good for mitigating damage.

name: Magia Fight
flavor_text: Attack formation that boosts STR/DEX/INT for the front and back. For parties with Styles that require multiple stat boosts.

name: Hurricane
flavor_text: Attack formation for mages which boosts the front line's STR/AGI, the middle line's INT, and the back line's DEX. The front line gains <special_effect=800000078>Post-Action Defense Boost</special_effect>, and the back line gains <special_effect=800000077>Pre-Action Defense Boost</special_effect>.

name: Tortoise Shell
flavor_text: Defensive formation that grants the entire party <special_effect=800000115>"All Allies Surviving Defense"</special_effect> and <special_effect=800000081>"Turn Start: Recover HP (all surviving)"</special_effect>. For sustained battles.

name: Magical Shower EX
flavor_text: Improved Magical Shower formation that boosts attack further. Grants the two back line member <special_effect=800000116>Weak Attack Boost</special_effect> and increases their action order.

name: Rising Phoenix EX
flavor_text: Improved Rising Phoenix formation that boosts attack and defense. Grants the middle Reduce Damage Taken, and boosts the front line's AGI.

name: Whirlwind
flavor_text:
Defensive formation which grants the front three members Post-Action Defense Boost. The front three draw enemy attacks. Boosts the party's AGI.
For parties which want to strike first and mitigate damage.

name: Inverse Hurricane
flavor_text: Attack formation for Styles using S. Swords, Bows, and Guns, which boosts the front member's INT/AGI, the middle line's DEX, and the back member's STR. The front member gains <special_effect=800000078>Post-Action Defense Boost</special_effect>, and the back member gains <special_effect=800000077>Pre-Action Defense Boost</special_effect>.

name: Dragon Stance EX
flavor_text: Improved Dragon Stance formation that boosts the front member further. The front member is further enhanced and gains <special_effect=800000117>"End of Turn: Recover BP"</special_effect>. Good for controlling action order.

name: Wave Array
flavor_text: Attack formation that optimizes use of each member's attributes. The front line's attacks are greatly enhanced. For quick battles.

name: Seer's Focus EX
flavor_text: Improved Seer's Focus formation that boosts all members further. Party's defense is boosted, improving party survival.

name: Muscle Road
flavor_text: Special formation that enhances direct attacks. Increases direct attack damage for the entire party, and reduces damage taken from enemies' direct attacks.

name: Mystic Line
flavor_text: Formation that increases the entire party's INT and reduces damage taken from indirect attacks. For parties with mainly mages.

name: Godspeed Stance
flavor_text: Technical formation that makes it easier to control the party's action order. The lead member's attributes are enhanced and is granted <special_effect=800000182>Fast Stance</special_effect>. The back members' actions are slowed down.

name: Great Rangers
flavor_text: Formation that draws out the potential of each ally and enhances their offense. Increases STR for the three front members, and DEX/INT for the two back members.

name: Rearguard Focus
flavor_text: Formation that enhances offense by increasing STR/DEX/INT for the back members, but grants them <special_effect=800000183>Delay Stance</special_effect>. Increases END/WIL for the three front members, making them easier to defend.

name: [STR+] Amazon Raid
flavor_text:
Attack formation that boosts the front line's STR.
For parties who mainly use Swords, G. Swords, Axes, Clubs, M. Arts and Spears.
Increases all allies' STR.
